pullrequest.title: Fix compilation using gcc8 and add support for c++17

content.raw:
/usr/include/ruby-2.5.0/ruby/missing.h:180:24: note: suggested alternative: 'isfinite'
     #   define isfinite(x) finite(x)

Looks like this ruby bug [https://bugs.ruby-lang.org/issues/12417](https://bugs.ruby-lang.org/issues/12417)

Is it possible to do

```c
#undef isfinite 
```

after including ruby headers? The advantage is the workaround is only in one place, not that the changes here are very big.
